artist: Painter: After Guido Reni; Artist: Francesco Rosaspina
description: Mary seated on a cloud, holding the baby Jesus, surrounded by cherubs; below the saint protectors of the city of Bologna
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Below image in black: Guido Reni dip    F. Rosaspina dis e inc. / MARIA VERGINE E GESU BAMBINO IN GLORIA CON ANGELI / E LI SANTE PROTETTORI DELLA CITTA DI BOLOGNA | on sheet in Pencil: 2-281
title: Virgin Mary with Child Jesus in Glory with Angels and the Saint Protectors of the City of Bologna
